content.text:
# Draft:Warrior Omega

----
Warrior Omega is a series of science fiction stories set in the same universe. It was created by Ryan Baker on August 24, 2002. The first story in the series was called "The Adventures of Warrior Omega", which details the adventures of Alan Arthur Stukov, a trucker from Earth, who finds himself in a scenario. He finds out about a robbery at a local military base on the border between Georgia and Florida.
References
https://www.deviantart.com/videodragon72/art/The-Adventures-of-Warrior-Omega-1179688687
